title.en: from the Reality Ḍākinīs’ Secret Treasury

text.en: Emaho!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: Glorious embodiment of the victorious ones of the three times without exception,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwa malü düpé pal

text.en: Deity whose compassion is swifter than all buddhas,
text.en-trans: sangye kün lé tukjé nyurwé lha

text.en: Protector and refuge of beings, Orgyen Rinpoche,
text.en-trans: drowé kyab gön orgyen rinpoche

text.en: Subduer of corrupting influences, Dorje Tötreng Tsal,
text.en-trans: lokdren tsarchö dorjé tötreng tsal

text.en: And tamer of malevolent ones, extremely wrathful Drolö,
text.en-trans: dukpa dul dzé yang trö drowolö

text.en: When I am confronted by the unbearable conflicts of these times,
text.en-trans: mi zö dü kyi yulngo gyepé tsé

text.en: I have no other refuge or hope but you,
text.en-trans: kyab dang resa zhen nama chipé

text.en: So I offer this prayer without doubt or hesitation.
text.en-trans: yinyi tetsom mepar solwa deb

text.en: From the imperceptible expanse, direct your wisdom towards us.
text.en-trans: mi ngön ying né tuk kyi gong dzö la

text.en: Avert the age of foreign invasion, conflicts and weapons.
text.en-trans: tamak dü truk tsön gyi kalpa dok

text.en: Protect us from the threat of failed harvests, frost, hail, and famine.
text.en-trans: lonyé sé ser mugé jikpa kyob

text.en: Dispel diseases and suffering that afflict both humans and livestock.
text.en-trans: mi chuk la tsé né dang dukngal sol

text.en: For those who harm the Buddha's teaching and its upholders,
text.en-trans: gyalwé ten dang tendzin la nöpé

text.en: Foreign demons, elemental spirits and human and non-human evildoers,
text.en-trans: gyadré jungpo mi dang mi min dön

text.en: And the malignant samaya-breakers who would harm the teachings,
text.en-trans: marung ten la tsé jé damsi rik

text.en: Do not hold back the might of your wisdom, love, and power.
text.en-trans: khyen tsé nü pé tutsal manenpar

text.en: The time has come to repel and subdue them all.
text.en-trans: tamché dok ching tulwé dü la bab

text.en: Grant your blessings, so that all adversity and dangers in this and future lives may be dispelled,
text.en-trans: di chi mitün nyertsé kün zhi né

text.en: No obstacles may arise to our accomplishment of enlightenment.
text.en-trans: changchub drub la barché minjung zhing

text.en: And all our aims and wishes may be swiftly fulfilled!
text.en-trans: samdön nyurdu drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung
